entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain mixed with snow before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
